summary: Based on the true story of Michael Alig, a Club Kid party organizer whose life was sent spiraling down when he bragged on television about killing his drug dealer and roommate.
cast: Seth Green|Macaulay Culkin|Diana Scarwid|Dillon Woolley|Marilyn Manson|Dylan McDermott|Mia Kirshner|Wilmer Valderrama|Elliot Kriss|Janis Dardaris|Wilson Cruz|Manny Perez|Justin Hagan|Brendan O'Malley|Phillip Knasiak|John Henry Summerour|John Stamos|Chloë Sevigny|Natasha Lyonne|Daniel Franzese|Michael Kaycheck|Steven Marcus|Angel Anes|Brian Bergdoll|Joey Gray|Amanda Lepore|Jill Lewis|Walt Paper|Richie Rich|Sacred Schneidmiller|James Sheldon|Gerrold Vincent
title: Party Monster
